mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yisheng_yuyue_uuid_number as yishengYuyueUuidNumber ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yisheng_yuyue_text as yishengYuyueText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.yisheng_yuyue_time as yishengYuyueTime ,a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_types as yishengYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_text as yishengYuyueYesnoText ,a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time as yishengYuyueShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yisheng.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,yisheng.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,yisheng.yisheng_content as yishengContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.zhiye_types as zhiyeTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney
FROM yisheng_yuyue a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yisheng_yuyue_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.yisheng_yuyue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_types = #{params.yishengYuyueYesnoTypes}
and a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueShenheTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and yisheng.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and yisheng.yisheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.zhiye_types = #{params.zhiyeTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
